title: Stubborn dog lifted up by owner on walk in Blackhall Colliery County Durham
text:
Buddy the dog refused to let go of his favourite toy, a large stick, while on a walk

This is the hilarious moment a dog refused to let go of his favourite toy - leaving him dangling in mid-air.

Buddy the dog had been enjoying playing with his stick so much he barely even realised his owner had picked him off the ground.

The video was taken in Blackhall Colliery, near Hartlepool in County Durham.

One of Buddy's owners walks toward the filmer with a large stick balanced over his shoulder

In the footage, Buddy and his owners had gone for a walk to the seaside on the north England coast.

But it appears all the playful dog was interested in was his favourite large chunk of wood.

At some point one of Buddy's owner decided playtime was over - most probably to speed their walk to the beach - and picked up the stick and held it over his shoulder.

However, the dog refused to let go, and can be heard hanging on to the toy while dangling off the ground.

The filmer can be heard laughing as she asks: 'Is he going to drop it?'

However it quickly becomes clear that Buddy is pretty fond of the stick and had refused to let go of it
description: Buddy the dog was playing with his favourite toy - a large stick - in a park near Blackhall Colliery, County Durham when his owner tried to take it off of him.
